Detailed Description

template<class KernelFunction>
class CovarianceOutputter< KernelFunction >

Computes the covariance between the two spike trains with the kernel KernelFunction.

The kernel must be a functor (const std::deque<Time> &, const std::deque<Time> &, const Time &, const Time &). The product of the rates of each spike train is is computed for all the spikes between times t_start and t_stop. The method template SpikingRateOutputter::operation depends on the the template parameter FileWrapper.

NeuronInterface *  const 
) [inline]

Returns 1, one correlation coefficient per pair of neurons.

Used by a class NeuronListHandler (see OutputterImpl) to determine the number of outputs to pass to a FileWrapper.

Performs the time-averaged rate of the spike train.

Method template called according to the real type of FileWrapper.

Parameters:
t_start Start time. Anterior spike times are ignored.
t_stop Stop time. Posterior spike times are ignored.
spike_list1 Spike list to perform the operation.
spike_list2 Spike list to perform the operation.
file_wrapper (of type FileWrapper).
